I'm so glad you're interested in watching Schitt's Creek!

**Seasons and Episodes:**
Schitt's Creek has a total of 6 seasons, with the following episode count per season:

1. Season 1: 13 episodes (2015)
2. Season 2: 13 episodes (2016)
3. Season 3: 13 episodes (2017)
4. Season 4: 13 episodes (2018)
5. Season 5: 14 episodes (2019)
6. Season 6: 14 episodes (2020)

**Total Episodes:** 80 episodes

**Binge-watching advice:**
Since there are only 6 seasons, it's easy to binge-watch the entire series. I recommend watching 2-3 episodes per sitting, as each episode is around 22 minutes long. This will give you time to absorb the storylines and characters without feeling overwhelmed.

**Streaming options:**
You can stream Schitt's Creek on various platforms, including:

* Netflix (in some regions, check your local Netflix catalog)
* CBC Gem (free with ads in Canada)
* Amazon Prime Video (available in many countries)
* Hulu (in the United States)
* Vudu (purchase individual episodes or seasons)
* DVD/Blu-ray (purchase physical copies)

Make sure to check the streaming options available in your region, as they might vary.

Get cozy, grab some popcorn, and enjoy your journey to Schitt's Creek!
